Package bishwas.gcdc.stripchartrecorder.helpers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertDialogHelper
    Constructs and shows a alert dialog
    BluetoothConnectionFactory
    Handles most of the bluetooth related operations Connects and sets up connection to the bluetooth device Receives messages from the device and forwards it to the main activity Sends commands to the device as well
    ConfigManager
    Responsible for storing Shared Preferences Has methods to store and retrieve Preference
    DateFormatter
    Responsible for formatting time in millis with the supplied format
    DemoDataSimulator
    Sends demo data values to the main activity to be plotted in the graph View
